description: Enumerates all listening TCP and UDP ports, correlates them with owning processes and executable paths, and flags potential anomalies such as nonstandard ports, executables in AppData, or executables in Temp directories. Outputs NDJSON (summary + per-port entry) and writes atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
